text: Auntie Mame is a 1958 American comedy drama movie directed by Morton DaCosta and based on the 1955 novel of the same name by Patrick Dennis. It stars Rosalind Russell, Forrest Tucker, Coral Browne, Fred Clark, Patric Knowles, Joanna Barnes, Lee Patrick and was distributed by Warner Bros.. It was nominated for 6 Academy Awards in 1959. ==Other websites== * * Category:1958 comedy movies Category:1958 drama movies Category:1950s comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Morton DaCosta
title: Auntie Mame
